channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- MQ Operator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- MQ Operator

item.title: CVE-2024-40680|2024-09-07T14:02:30.422Z -- ibm -- mq%20operator
item.description: IBM MQ Operator 2.0.26 and 3.2.4 could allow a local user to cause a denial of service due to improper memory allocation causing a segmentation fault.

item.title: CVE-2024-40681|2024-09-07T14:09:19.767Z -- ibm -- mq%20operator
item.description: IBM MQ Operator 2.0.26 and 3.2.4 could allow an authenticated user in a specifically defined role, to bypass security restrictions and execute actions against the queue manager.

item.title: CVE-2024-39742|2024-08-02T04:26:15.955Z -- ibm -- mq%20operator
item.description: IBM MQ Operator 3.2.2 and IBM MQ Operator 2.0.24 could allow a user to bypass authentication under certain configurations due to a partial string comparison vulnerability. IBM X-Force ID: 297169.

item.title: CVE-2024-39743|2024-08-02T04:26:16.002Z -- ibm -- mq%20operator
item.description: IBM MQ Operator 3.2.2 and IBM MQ Operator 2.0.24 IBM MQ Container Developer Edition is vulnerable to denial of service caused by incorrect memory de-allocation. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 297172.

item.title: CVE-2024-39742|2024-07-09T20:40:48.587Z -- ibm -- mq%20operator
item.description: IBM MQ Operator 3.2.2 and IBM MQ Operator 2.0.24 could allow a user to bypass authentication under certain configurations due to a partial string comparison vulnerability. IBM X-Force ID: 297169.

item.description: IBM MQ Operator 3.2.2 and IBM MQ Operator 2.0.24 could allow a user to cause a denial of service under certain configurations due to a partial string comparison vulnerability. IBM X-Force ID: 297172.

item.description: IBM MQ Operator 3.2.2 and IBM MQ Operator 2.0.24 could allow a user to bypass authentication under certain configurations due to a partial string comparison vulnerability. IBM X-Force ID: 297169.

item.description: IBM MQ Operator 3.2.2 and IBM MQ Operator 2.0.24 could allow a user to cause a denial of service under certain configurations due to a partial string comparison vulnerability. IBM X-Force ID: 297172.

item.title: CVE-2024-39743|2024-07-12T13:48:40.013Z -- ibm -- mq%20operator
item.description: IBM MQ Operator 3.2.2 and IBM MQ Operator 2.0.24 IBM MQ Container Developer Edition is vulnerable to denial of service caused by incorrect memory de-allocation. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 297172.
